author: hqucms
body: As discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/32883#issuecomment-828393966, we would like to test the dynamic arch option in ONNXRuntime. The `MLAS_DYNAMIC_CPU_ARCH` is changed from 0 (no dynamic arch) to 2 (dynamic arch, use up to AVX2).
title: Enable DYNAMIC_CPU_ARCH in ONNXRuntime to use up to AVX2
